item.title: what I know to be true [22]
item.description: What I know to be true at 22, and possibly not at 23. What I know changes with each of the lives that I live. I think it’d be fun to do one of these every year :) What I know to be true is that attention and observation are what make life meaningful. I want to witness the world and the people in it. Attending to myself, to friends, to nature, to strangers has never been more pressing.
